items.sentence: I plan to move back to Boston since my whole family lives there.
I saw the look on your face when Tom asked you to wait for Mary.
It\'s possible that we won\'t be able to eat tuna in the future.
I congratulate you on winning first prize in the speech contest.
Tom promised to meet Mary at the usual time and the usual place.
There are three empty rooms. However, we can\'t use any of them.
Those books look as if they\'re going to topple over any minute.
I don\'t see why Tom wouldn\'t want to go to the dance with you.
Tom thought the house Mary wanted to buy was a little too small.
If Tom would smile more often, he\'d probably have more friends.
